title: User Login Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully login with valid email and password credentials and receives a valid JWT token.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter a valid registered email address
Enter the correct password
Click the Login button
Verify login success and receipt of valid JWT token
User is redirected to the homepage or dashboard

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails when invalid email or password is provided and an appropriate error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter a valid registered email address
Enter an incorrect password
Click the Login button
Verify that login is rejected
Error message about invalid credentials is displayed

title: User Signup with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can successfully sign up with valid details including role selection and receives confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page
Fill in all required fields with valid data (email, password, role selection, etc.)
Submit the signup form
Verify user account is created and confirmation message is shown
User is optionally logged in or redirected to login page

title: Password Reset Flow with OTP
description: Verify the password reset process including requesting OTP, validating OTP, and setting a new password.

steps.description: Navigate to the forgot password page
Enter registered email address for password reset
Request OTP for password reset
Verify OTP is sent to the provided email
Enter received OTP and new password
Submit new password
Verify password is successfully reset and user can login with new password

title: Browse Product Catalog with Filters and Sorting
description: Verify users can browse products with category filters, price range, brand, size, and color filters along with sorting options.

steps.description: Navigate to the shop page
Verify product grid loads with product images and prices
Use category filter to select one category
Verify product grid updates to show only products in selected category
Apply price range filter with minimum and maximum value
Verify products match price range filter
Apply brand filter
Verify product grid updates accordingly
Apply size and color filters
Verify filtered results only show products that match all selected criteria
Sort products by price ascending
Verify products are sorted correctly by ascending price
Sort products by newest arrivals
Verify products are sorted correctly by newest

title: Product Detail Page Display and Interactions
description: Verify the product detail page shows all relevant details, images with zoom, selectable size/color options, reviews, and add to cart/wishlist functionality.

steps.description: Navigate to a specific product detail page via product card or direct link
Verify main image and additional gallery images are displayed
Use image zoom feature on main image
Verify zoom displays enlarged image properly
Verify product description and specifications are visible
Verify customer reviews and ratings are displayed
Select size and color options
Verify selected options visually update and are selectable
Click 'Add to Cart' button
Verify product (with selected options) is added to shopping cart
Click 'Add to Wishlist' button
Verify product is added to wishlist

title: Add, Update, Remove Items in Shopping Cart
description: Verify users can add products to cart, change quantities, remove products, apply promo codes, and see updated prices in real-time.

steps.description: Navigate to cart page
Verify all cart items are displayed with correct images, names, options, and prices
Update quantity of a cart item
Verify total price updates accordingly in real-time
Remove an item from the cart
Verify item is removed and pricing updates correctly
Enter valid promo code and apply
Verify promo code discounts are applied and shown in totals
Click 'Proceed to Checkout' button
Verify navigation to checkout page

title: Multi-step Checkout Completion with COD Payment
description: Verify that authenticated users can complete checkout by providing shipping info, selecting Cash on Delivery payment, reviewing order, and receiving confirmation.

steps.description: Login with valid user account
Navigate to checkout page with items in cart
Enter valid shipping address details
Select Cash On Delivery as payment method
Review order summary for accuracy
Confirm and place the order
Verify order confirmation is shown and order details are saved

title: Merchant Product Creation, Editing and Deletion
description: Verify merchants can perform CRUD operations for products with image uploading through Cloudinary and proper validation.

steps.description: Login as merchant user
Navigate to merchant products page
Click 'Add Product' button and fill in valid product details with all required fields
Upload main product image via drag-and-drop
Upload up to 5 additional images
Set available sizes and colors
Enter stock quantity
Submit the product creation form
Verify product appears in merchant's product list
Click edit icon and modify product details
Verify product updates are saved and reflected
Click delete icon to remove product
Verify product is removed from product list

title: Merchant Order Management and Status Update
description: Verify merchants can view incoming orders, filter by status, update order status, add notes, and print packing slips.

steps.description: Login as merchant user
Navigate to merchant orders page
Verify list of orders is displayed with various statuses
Use status filters to view orders by processing, shipped, delivered
Select an order to view details
Update order status to 'shipped'
Add internal notes to the order
Print packing slip for the order
Verify order status and notes are saved and packing slip is generated

title: User Profile Information and Body Measurement Management
description: Verify authenticated users can view and update personal information and body measurements, and see order history section.

steps.description: Login as a registered user
Navigate to profile page
Verify current profile information is displayed correctly
Edit name, email, phone number, and address fields
Add or update body measurements including chest, waist, hips, height, and weight
Save profile changes
Verify updated information is saved and displayed correctly
Verify order history section is present and lists past orders

title: Order History Viewing and Shipment Tracking
description: Verify that logged-in users can view order history with status filtering, view order details, track shipments, and cancel unshipped orders.

steps.description: Login as a registered user
Navigate to orders page
Verify list of all user orders with correct statuses is displayed
Apply filters to show orders by pending, shipped, and delivered status
Verify filters display correct subset of orders
Select an order to view detailed information
Verify order details including items, prices, and shipment tracking info
Use tracking number link or widget to track shipment status externally
Attempt to cancel an order that is not yet shipped
Verify order is cancelled and status is updated
Attempt to cancel an order that has been shipped
Verify cancellation is prevented and appropriate message is shown

title: AI-Powered Personalized Product Recommendations
description: Verify authenticated users receive personalized recommendations based on their browsing and purchase history, and can interact with recommended items.

steps.description: Login as a registered user with browsing history
Navigate to recommendations page
Verify personalized product grid is displayed
Verify presence of 'Recommended for You' section based on user behavior
Verify 'Complete the Look' outfit suggestions are shown
Click a recommended product
Verify navigation to product detail page of selected recommended product

title: Wishlist Management: Add, Remove, Share
description: Verify that authenticated users can view, manage, add to cart from wishlist, remove products, and share their wishlist.

steps.description: Login as a registered user
Navigate to wishlist page
Verify all saved favorite products are displayed correctly
Remove a product from the wishlist
Verify product is removed and wishlist updates
Add a product from wishlist to the shopping cart
Verify product appears in shopping cart
Use wishlist share feature to share via link or supported methods
Verify generated shareable wishlist link or sharing dialog appears

title: Admin Dashboard Metrics and User Management
description: Verify admin users can view platform-wide statistics, manage user accounts including suspension and deletion, approve or reject merchant applications, and moderate product listings.

steps.description: Login as an admin user
Navigate to the admin dashboard
Verify platform statistics for users, orders, and revenue are displayed
Verify merchant performance rankings are shown
Access user management section
Suspend a user account
Verify the user account is suspended and changes are reflected
Delete a user account
Verify the user account is removed from the system
Review pending merchant applications and approve or reject
Verify merchant applications status updates and notifications are sent
Moderate product listings (e.g. approve or reject inappropriate listings)
Verify product moderation actions take place and listings update accordingly

title: Language Switching Between English and Arabic with RTL Support
description: Verify that users can switch language instantly between English and Arabic and that UI updates correctly with proper RTL layout and mirrored elements.

steps.description: Navigate to any page with language switcher visible
Click on language switcher control
Select Arabic from the language options
Verify UI text changes to Arabic and all interface elements switch to RTL layout
Verify menus, buttons, icons appear mirrored appropriately
Switch language back to English
Verify UI text switches back to English and layout returns to LTR
